name: Steve Jobs
comment: My job is not to be easy on people. My job is to make them better.

name: Bill Gates
comment: If you born poor it's not a mistake, If you die poor it's a mistake.

name: Mark Zuckerberg
comment: Faceook. I have nothing more to add.

name: Albert Einstain
comment: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough
